content: about this shawl ✔ worked sideways flat ✔ shape rectangle ✔ skill level beginner ✔ type of instructions easy to follow written instructions and photo tutorial included ** paid version only for photo tutorial ** - does not include any charts ✔ language standard american terms written in english only required materials ✔ hook us i/5 5mm crochet hook ✔ yarn cascade 220 aran yarn or any aran yarn sizing ✔ size approx 18 width x 68 5 length ✔ some advice is given if you are wanting to use a thinner yarn like 4ply or dk ** paid version only ** ✔ multiples will not be given refund policy ✔ all digital sales are final about ✔ truly crochet is my blog where i share my latest free crochet shawl patterns this version on etsy is an ad-free pdf version of my free pattern disclaimer ✔ © trulycrochet do not copy share or sell the pattern in part or whole you may sell the finished item made using this pattern with pattern credit
